long_description: The Leatherman Crater c33Tx knife combines a handy blade with 2 screwdrivers. Never be stuck saying, "I only have my knife" again! Partially serrated blade is made of 420HC stainless steel; it features a thumb stud and Blade Launcher(R) assist for easy opening. This knife is built tough with a glass-filled nylon handle and locking liner. The Leatherman Crater c33Tx knife features a flat screwdriver, Phillips screwdriver, carabiner clip, bottle opener and removable pocket clip.
short_description: The Leatherman Crater c33Tx knife combines a handy blade with 2 screwdrivers. Never be stuck saying, "I only have my knife" again!
